scripts.export: npm run build && next export && npm run build && npm run export-static-root
scripts.publish: npm run export-static-root && gh-pages -d out -t -r https://github.com/onepagehistory/onepagehistory.github.io.git -b master -m "Updates $(git log -1 --pretty=format:'%h - %s' --abbrev-commit)"
scripts.staging-publish: npm run export-static-root && echo "stg1.worldhistory.page" > ./out/CNAME && echo "" > ./out/GA.js && gh-pages -d out -t -r https://github.com/onepagehistory/staging-1.git -b master -m "Updates $(git log -1 --pretty=format:'%h - %s' --abbrev-commit)"
